page.title: 05FIRE IN WESTWOOD HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: In the early hours of one morning in July 1983 a fire started in the main buildings of Westwood Hall.Two boys had started the fire after having used matches to help them in their night raid on the Tuck Shop.Three days later the stones were still too hot to touch.In the fire the staff room,4 teaching rooms,heads office,main stairs and entrance hall were badly damaged.Because of its historical value and beauty the building was reconstructed.It is said that 15,000 pounds worth of damage was done.
